name: places/ChIJJ2RIt6VZwokRYrEV4CUoWis
formattedAddress: 1751 Park Ave, New York, NY 10035, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1751 Park Ave, New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text: This is the worst school to put your child in. If you are a parent who cares about your child safety and education. They went months without a speech therapist and didnt reach out to parents until I asked. They sent my child home without eating twice. They also sent him home with an unexplained busted lip. He is constantly sick since attending the school ( a different virus every week) and constantly misses weeks because of this. When asked for a conference with the director  since January 31, 2022 she not only never responded to any emails she did not return any of my calls she claims never to have received them even though I spoke with her receptionist several times regarding it. Parents are not allowed inside at all. They make parents fell like criminals. And on top of everything they call fake Acs cases on parents. Please please please dont put your child in this school! It is the absolute worst and the direct Ms.Stewart does not care about any of the parents concerns. If I can I would give this school negative stars!

originalText.text: My son - who has Autism, attended this school for 2 years! Loved it! The teachers, paraprofessionals and office staff were amazing! Good communication and I wish they expanded bc he would have stayed longer!!
